com.foreach.across.modules.hibernate.repositories

Interface BasicRepository<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicRepositoryImpl
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public interface BasicRepository<T>

    Basic implementation for a simple Hibernate based repository. Deprecated, favour the use of Spring Data JPA repositories instead.
